description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Board' that renders a 3x3 grid of 'Cell' components for a Tic Tac Toe game, delegating click handling via the onPlay prop and visually indicating winning cells.

methods.name: Board({ squares, onPlay, winLine = [] })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the Tic Tac Toe grid with passing of props, including squares array, onPlay handler, and optional winLine array for highlighting winning cells.
